availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Seth S. Jones (Warren County, Kentucky, famer.)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, famer. Bedford County, Virginia, native. Son of Jane Jones. Married to Elizabeth A. Briggs Jones in Warren County, Kentucky, on February 26, 1849. Father of Mary M. Jones and William H. Jones. Farmer in Warren County in 1850. Owned nine enslaved persons in Warren County in 1850. Farmer in Warren County in 1860. Owned eleven enslaved people in Warren County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 1, p. 62B.
